_sText:
Counter-Strike: Source : Bot's Navigation Mesh for the map DE_TEGEA_CSS_FINAL


Nav Creator: Meurglis3, Release Date: March 25 2014

Here is the Navigation Mesh for one of the most detailed and fascinating (imho) office-themed map [de_tegea_css_final](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/177451) by MayheM (released May 2007). It's a created from scratch and fully hand-tuned .nav-file (because no one of available earlier nav-files wasn't rather playable).

Most areas and paths were remade manually or created from scratch because during an auto-generation processing the majority of them were constructed incorrectly or incomplete. Some important pathways were broken off (in particular ladders on a both bombsites and some others paths). Many inaccuracies should be corrected manually...

Now, after manually reworking of nearly 80% of a Navigation Mesh, bots have opportunity to use all walkable ways and (I hope) will be able to keep the worthy company for human players! ;-)

Also this Navigation Mesh is fully Place Painted.

NOTE: For possibility of comparison and in-game testing the original nav-file by BarnDoor included in archive and available to downloading with the [same map](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/177451).

Thanks to all for the shown interest. Your responses and remarks are always welcomed!

Credits and Gratitudes:
   MayheM (for high detailed and very realistic office-themed map).

Additional Gratitudes:
   BarnDoor (for perfect playable navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),
   Chizbone (for informative and clever article BOT_BRAINED and a set of excellent navigation meshes),
   CoCoNUT (for fine hand-tuned navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),
   Valve Developer Community (for learning articles by Navigation Meshes and Navigation Mesh Commands).

Long Live Great Maps!

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

**UPDATED 03.11.2014**

General Fixes:
- Added Place Names;
- Improved bot's movement on a CT Spawnpoint (Front);
- Other minor changes.

**PLEASE REDOWNLOAD UPDATED ARCHIVE!**
